title: Binge Worthy Television
description:
Hembo joins Buster to discuss being on the verge of fatherhood, lineup protection, Albert Pujols’ renaissance, a 39-year-old pitcher at the peak of his powers and Bryce Harper’s return. Then, Karl Ravech stops by to talk about Hawaii’s dominance in the Little League World Series, Paul Goldschmidt in the hunt for the triple crown, if the NL Central race is officially over, whether the Red Sox are dead or alive and Nestor Cortez’s groin issue.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Hembo and Buster discuss lineup protection, Albert Pujols, Justin Verlander and Bryce Harper's return. Plus, Karl Ravech on Paul Goldschmidt's hunt for the triple crown and if the NL Central race is over
